subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Rick Nash scored twice as the Rangers swept a three-game trip through Canada. Florida outlasted Washington when Nick Bjugstad scored on the 40th shot of the shootout and beat Braden Holtby on the right side.
snippet: Rick Nash scored twice as the Rangers swept a three-game trip through Canada. Florida outlasted Washington when Nick Bjugstad scored on the 40th shot of the shootout and beat Braden Holtby on the right side.
